contentrichtext.text: <!-- See [[Wikipedia:WikiProject Indian cities]] for details --> {{Infobox settlement | name = Maya Bazar | native_name = मया बाजार | native_name_lang = hi | other_name = | settlement_type = [[Block (country subdivision)|Block]] | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | nickname = | map_alt = | map_caption = | pushpin_map = India Uttar Pradesh | pushpin_label_position = right | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = | latd = 26.58 | latm = | lats = | latNS = N | longd = 82.38 | longm = | longs = | longEW = E | coordinates_display = inline,title | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = India | subdivision_type1 = [[States and territories of India|State]] | subdivision_name1 = [[Uttar Pradesh]] | subdivision_type2 = [[List of districts of India|District]] | subdivision_name2 = [[Faizabad District|Faizabad]] | established_title = <!-- Established --> | established_date = | founder = | named_for = | government_type = | governing_body = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_rank = | area_total_km2 = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_total = 154666 | population_as_of = 2011 | population_rank = | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = | demographics_type1 = Languages | demographics1_title1 = Official | demographics1_info1 = [[Hindi]] | demographics1_title1 = Regional | demographics1_info1 = [[Awadhi language|Awadhi]] | timezone1 = [[Indian Standard Time|IST]] | utc_offset1 = +5:30 | postal_code_type = [[Postal Index Number|PIN]] | postal_code = 224161 | area_code_type = Telephone code | area_code = 05271 | registration_plate = UP-42 | website = | footnotes = }} '''Maya Bazar''' also known as '''Maya''' is a [[Block (country subdivision)|Block]] and city in '''[[Faizabad]]''' district in the [[India]]n state of '''[[Uttar Pradesh]]'''. '''Maya Bazar''' is a small and one of the oldest market in Faizabad district of Uttar Pradesh. The main occupation is agriculture. == Administration == * Name of MP: Sh. Nirmal khatri. (As of 2011) * Name of MLA: Sh. Abhay Singh. (As of 2013) * Name of Lokshaba : Faizabad. * Name of Vidhan Shaba : Goshainganj. * Name of Jila panchyat sadasya:Sh. Dhrub Gupta ==Geography== Maya Bazar is located at {{Coord|26.58|N|82.38|E|}}.<ref>[http://www.fallingrain.com/world/IN/36/Gosainganj.html Falling Rain Genomics, Inc - Gosainganj]</ref> It has an average elevation of 0 ==Transport== ===By road=== Goshainganj is situated on the [[Faizabad]] to [[Akbarpur, Ambedkar Nagar|Akbarpur]] road and is well connected to other towns and cities viz. * [[Faizabad]] * [[Goshainganj]] * [[Akbarpur, Ambedkar Nagar|Akbarpur]] * [[Mehbubganj]] * [[Katehri]] * [[Iltifatganj]] * [[Amsin]] * [[Nev Kabirpur]] * [[Benwa]] (or Beniya) ===By train=== * [[Goshainganj Railway Station]] * [[Alnabhari Railway Station(Only Passenger Trains Stop Here)]] ===Famous Places=== * Ramlila maidan * Rahul Tent house ===Hospital othere Govt. Facilites=== * Govt. Hospital * There are so many local hospital for not much more serious diease * Some famous Mediacl shop "Jagdish Medical Store" "Sahu Medical Store" * Maya Post Office * Police Station(Maharajganj) ====Devotional Places==== * Hanuman Mandir (Maya Bazar) * Kariya Baba (Tandauli) * Hathi Ram Baba (Dalpatpur) * ===Schools and Colleges=== * Dwapar Vidya peeth inter college, Barai Para * Koshal Mahavidyalaya, Barai para * Govt. Junior HIgh School * There are so may Priamry Schools * ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Faizabad district}} [[Category:Faizabad district]] [[Category:Cities and towns in Faizabad district]] {{Faizabad-geo-stub}}
